name: getting-started-with-express-js-to-build-json-api-in-node
description: we will discuss crud operations. create, read, update and delete.  Express is framework for nodejs. NodeJS is JavaScript that run on server side. we will learn First generate project with node js. second write first Express js project. then how to run  server. how to create our routes. Next, roots to get all resources to get a specific resource by ID to delete or update a resource  we want to focus on express so we don't need to deal with any database configuration. we will have books and we can get all books or get book by specific id or update title of book or delete book.
author: Mueen Arif
